mapper.update: UPDATE customer c, (SELECT customer_id, max(rental_date), DATEDIFF(NOW(), max(rental_date)) FROM rental GROUP BY customer_id HAVING DATEDIFF(NOW(), max(rental_date)) > 365) A SET c.active = 0 WHERE c.customer_id = A.customer_id
mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_id customerId, c.store_id storeId, CONCAT(c.first_name, ' ', c.last_name) name, c.email email, a.address address, a.district district, CASE WHEN c.active = 1 THEN '활동' ELSE '휴면' END active, c.create_date createDate FROM customer c JOIN address a ON c.address_id = a.address_id WHERE c.customer_id = #{customerId}
SELECT SUM(p.amount) total FROM payment p WHERE p.customer_id = #{customerId} GROUP BY p.customer_id

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT r.customer_id customerId, i.inventory_id, i.film_id, r.rental_date, r.return_date, DATEDIFF(r.return_date, r.rental_date) DAY, if(DATEDIFF(r.return_date, r.rental_date) IS NULL, '대여중', if(DATEDIFF(r.return_date, r.rental_date) > f.rental_duration, '연체', '정상반납')) state, f.rental_duration FROM inventory i JOIN film f ON i.film_id = f.film_id JOIN rental r ON r.inventory_id = i.inventory_id) e WHERE e.state='연체' AND e.customerId=#{customerId}
